dct_title_s: A map of the Province of New York with part of Pensilvania, and New England
dct_description_sm: Prime meridian: London. Relief shown pictorially and by hachures. Inscribed: To the Right Honourable Sir Jeffery Amherst ... by his most obliged humble servant, John Montrésor, engineer. Shows administrative divisions. Includes continuations of Lake Champlain and the Connecticut River.
dct_subject_sm: New York (State)—Administrative and political divisions—Maps—Early works to 1800
dcat_theme_sm: New York (State)—Administrative and political divisions—Maps—Early works to 1800
